article: Have you ever suddenly felt that someone you knew was in trouble Have you ever dreamed something that _ later Maybe you have ESP. ESP stands _ Extra Sensory Perception. It may be called _ sixth sense. It seems to let people _ about events before they happen, or events _ are happening some _ away. There are thousands of stories on _ . Scientists are studying _ to find out what s behind these _ mental messages. Here s an example, one of hundreds of _ that have come true. a man dreamed he was walking along a road _ a horse and carriage came by. The driver said, There s room for one more. The man felt the driver was Death, _ he ran away. The next day, the _ was getting on a crowded bus. The bus driver said, There s room for one more . Then the man saw that the driver s face was the same face he _ in the dream. He would not _ the bus. As the bus drove off, it _ crashed and burst into flames. Everyone was _ Some people say stories like this are lies or _ . Others, including some scientists, _ that ESP is real. From studies of ESP, we may someday learn more about _ mind. 36.
